name: BattlePhrögg
description:
This game was made in 48 hours as part of the Spring 2D Jam 2021 (BattlePhrogg_02.7z) and Mini Jam 79: Frogs (BattlePhrogg_03.7z), by 5 Buas students. We followed the limitations of both game jams.

Battlephrögg is a 2D shooter about a frog on the hunt for insects. 

  • Use your tongue to eat insects and gain their powers.
  • Shoot enemies using the absorbed powers.
  • Attack types get stronger the more insects you eat.

Goal

Survive the endless waves of enemies and get the highest score

Controls

MoveWASDAimMouseShootLMBTongue (eat)RMB


Credits

Adriaan Koorevaar - Programming

Yuli Ognyanov - Systems Design and Programming

Kristjan Kull - Systems Design and Programming

Veronica Redlaff - Visual Art

Hugo Bomberen - Audio and Level Design

SFX

Adobe audition sound effects library
